snippet: A federal judge conducted a hearing intended to resolve remaining pretrial issues, and raised questions about aspects of the government’s corruption case against City Councilman Larry B. Seabrook.
abstract: Federal District Court Judge Deborah A Batts raises questions about aspects of the government's corruption case against New York City Councilman Larry B Seabrook, saying she is trying to protect the jury from irrelevance and dead ends; schedule retrial follows a 2011 mistrial.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge conducted a hearing intended to resolve remaining pretrial issues, and raised questions about aspects of the government’s corruption case against City Councilman Larry B. Seabrook.

headline.seo: Legal Fine-Tuning Precedes Retrial of City Councilman Larry B. Seabrook
headline.main: Before Retrial of Lawmaker, More Discord
headline.print_headline: Before Retrial Of Lawmaker, More Discord
